title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in the library outline view.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Add a label to a library file.
3. Select the label item in the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, no item gets selected.
EB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the desired item should be selected.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Add a label to a library file.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view and verify that it gets selected.
